title: These Shoes
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR120L
description: These Shoes focuses on objects familiar to all students - shoes. The story uses repetitive sentences with adjectives to describe many kinds of shoes. Students will be engaged with the bright illustrations featuring children. This book is well suited to the early emergent reader, and provides opportunities to teach skills such as comparing and visualizing.
reviewWords: big, blue, funny, old, red, shiny, shoes, tall, wet
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast information
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /f/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Understand and use the high-frequency word these
